How You'll Learn

Our comprehensive approach combines theory, practice, and community support

Theory Meets Practice

Course Syllabus

Prerequisites

Prior programming experience (1+ year) Command line basics No prior ML knowledge required

Module 1: Introduction to Machine Learning

Module 1
ML vs Rule-Based Systems Supervised Learning CRISP-DM Framework Model Selection Process Environment Setup

Module 2: Machine Learning for Regression

Module 2
Car Price Prediction Project Exploratory Data Analysis Linear Regression Basics Feature Engineering & Regularization

Module 3: Machine Learning for Classification

Module 3
Churn Prediction Project Feature Selection & Encoding Logistic Regression Model Interpretation

Module 4: Evaluation Metrics

Module 4
Accuracy, Precision, Recall ROC Curves & AUC Cross-Validation

Module 5: Deploying ML Models

Module 5
Saving & Loading Models Flask API Deployment Docker & Virtual Environments Cloud Deployment (AWS)

Module 6: Decision Trees & Ensemble Learning

Module 6
Decision Trees Random Forest & Gradient Boosting Model Selection & Hyperparameter Tuning

Module 7: Neural Networks & Deep Learning

Module 7
TensorFlow & Keras Convolutional Neural Networks Transfer Learning Model Optimization & Regularization

Module 8: Serverless Deep Learning

Module 8
Introduction to Serverless AWS Lambda & TensorFlow Lite API Gateway

Module 9: Kubernetes & TensorFlow Serving

Module 9
TensorFlow Model Serving Kubernetes Basics Deploying ML Models to Kubernetes

Frequently Asked Questions

Do I need prior programming experience?

No! This course is designed for complete beginners. We start with Python basics and gradually build up to advanced topics.

How much time should I dedicate per week?

We recommend 8-10 hours per week, including video lectures, assignments, and project work. The course is flexible to accommodate different schedules.

What software/tools do I need?

All you need is a computer with internet access. We'll guide you through installing Python, Jupyter notebooks, and all necessary libraries.

Is there a certificate upon completion?

Yes! You'll receive a verified certificate of completion that you can add to your LinkedIn profile and resume.

What if I fall behind or need extra help?

We have a dedicated Slack community, weekly office hours, and 1-on-1 mentoring sessions available for students who need additional support.

Is there a money-back guarantee?

We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the course, we'll refund your payment in full.
